title: David Copperfield forced to reveal secrets behind vanishing act in court
text:
David Copperfield forced to reveal secrets behind vanishing act in court 3:33am BST - 01:47 
Magician David Copperfield was forced to reveal the secrets behind a vanishing act in court after a British man claimed he was injured during Copperfield's ''Lucky #13'' trick in November 2013 in Las Vegas. Colette Luke has more. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
